resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/82286</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>82286</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4243</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The days of the Week</string>
            <string language="es">Los días de la semana</string>
            <string language="ga">Laethanta na Seachtaine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Tage der Woche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les jours de la semaine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os dias da semana</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I giorni della settimana</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι ημέρες της εβδομάδας</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Child will name an activity and link it with a day of the week. This activity combines language learning with an appreciation of the passage of time. Suitable for students with Mild/Moderate Special Needs.</string>
            <string language="es">El niño nombrará una actividad y la vinculará con un día de la semana. Esta actividad combina el aprendizaje del idioma con la apreciación del paso del tiempo. Apropiada para estudiantes con necesidades especiales leves/moderadas.</string>
            <string language="ga">Ainmneoidh an leanbh gníomhaíocht agus nascfaidh sé/sí í le lá den tseachtain. Ceanglaíonn an ghníomhaíocht seo foghlaim teanga le tuiscint ar imeacht ama. Feiliúnach do mhic léinn le Riachtanais Speisialta Bhoga/Mheasarthacha.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Maths</string>
            <string language="es">Matemáticas. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Mata</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kind benennt eine Aktivität und bindet sie mit 
einem Tag der Woche. Diese Aktivität kombiniert das Erlernen 
der Sprache mit einer Anerkennung des Durchganges der Zeit. 
Verwendbar für Kursteilnehmer mit Mild/Moderate speziellen 
Notwendigkeiten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'enfant nommera une activité et la joindra avec 
un jour de la semaine. Cette activité combine la connaissance 
des langues avec une appréciation du passage du temps. 
Approprié aux étudiants avec les besoins spéciaux de 
Mild/Moderate.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A criança nomeará uma atividade e ligá-la-á 
com um dia da semana. Esta atividade combina a aprendizagem de 
língua com uma apreciação da passagem do tempo. Apropriado 
para estudantes com necessidades especiais de Mild/Moderate.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il bambino chiamerà un'attività e la collegherà
con un giorno della settimana. Questa attività unisce 
l'apprendimento delle lingue con un apprezzamento del passaggio di 
tempo. Adatto ad allievi con i bisogni speciali di 
Mild/Moderate.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το παιδί θα ονομάσει μια δραστηριότητα και θα την 
συνδέσει με μια ημέρα της εβδομάδας. Αυτή η δραστηριότητα 
συνδυάζει την εκμάθηση γλωσσών με μια εκτίμηση της μετάβασης του 
χρόνου. Κατάλληλος για τους σπουδαστές με ήπιο/συγκρατήστε 
τις ειδικές ανάγκες.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Maths</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Maths</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Per la matematica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
